description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bad guys are doing their thing, the world needs a hero - and so on...  But what you really need to know is that you get to BLOW UP CARS DRIVING SLOW IN THE FAST LANE.  Defeat the enemy using multiple weapons and use nitrous boost to get adrenaline rushes before time runs out.  Local/global scoreboards, unlockable awards, more.  Use of unnecessary violence to save the day... has been approved.
